original: 《三國演義》虛構之人物，為黃巾軍「地公將軍」張寶部下。與張寶在陽城遭受朱雋與劉備的聯合攻打，嚴政見大勢已去，便殺張寶取其首級投降於朱雋。
text: The fictitious character in 'The Romance of the Three Kingdoms' is a subordinate of Zhang Bao, the Yellow Turban Army 'General of the Land'. In Yangcheng, he and Zhang Bao were attacked by Zhu Jun and Liu Bei. Yan Zheng saw that the situation was over, so he killed Zhang Bao and surrendered to Zhu Jun.
